Designed with input from climbing legend Fred Nicole, these medium-stiff shoes are built for bouldering and sport routes. They feature a moderate downturn for precise edging and enhanced control. The soft foot-hugging upper delivers a sock-like fit for enhanced sensitivity on tough holds. Engineered fit - adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot with an engineered fit for targeted support that enhances movement. High-friction rubber outsole - Stealth(R) C4 rubber outsole for unbeatable grip and unparalleled edging power.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GAMBIT VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Move outdoors. These climbing shoes offer a blend of sensitivity and support so you can take your climb from the gym to the rock. They're built with a lined leather upper with a breathable tongue for comfort. A Stealth(R) C4 rubber outsole provides unbeatable grip and unparalleled edging power.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GRANDSTONE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Answer the call of classic trad climbs. These shoes feature a lined leather upper and barrel lacing for a snug, comfortable fit suitable for extended wear on the rock. A stiff midsole provides the added support your feet need for long days and multi-pitch routes.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN WALL MASTER MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Transition from the gym to outdoors. These shoes are designed for climbers making the move to natural routes. Built with a moderately flat profile, they have a breathable unlined leather upper for a comfortable fit that conforms to the foot. A stiff midsole provides support and structure for cracks and edging. The sticky rubber outsole helps make the most of any foothold.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: A quiver of one, these climbing shoes are equally adept indoors and out. They're lined to minimize stretch and maintain the toe box shape. A medium-stiff midsole offers a blend of sensitivity and support for all-purpose climbing and long days at the crags. The hook-and-loop closure offers easy entry.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GYM MASTER MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: These climbing shoes are designed specifically for gym rental fleets and climbing programs. Based on the Wall Master design, they're built for durability and comfort. The canvas upper is machine washable and will not stretch out. A stiff midsole provides support for novice climbers.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI PRO MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Fit and feel are everything. These shoes blend sensitivity and power for all-around climbing. This pro edition features a rubber toe patch for hooking and tension at the heel for a precise fit. They have a lined build that minimizes stretch and maintains the toe box shape. A medium-stiff midsole provides comfort on long days at the crags, and the hook-and-loop closure offers easy entry.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: A day at the crags or an evening at the gym. These quiver of one climbing shoes are equally adept indoors and out. They have a medium-stiff midsole for comfort on long routes. The slightly stretchy shape offers a blend of sensitivity and support for full days of all-purpose climbing.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN MOCCASYM MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Project or problem. These climbing shoes deliver comfort and simplicity in an easy-on, easy-off design. They're an updated version of the shoe that set the bar for low-profile climbing slippers. A full leather upper conforms to your foot for lasting comfort. The soft build is well suited for crack climbing and gym training sessions.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN TEAM 5.10 MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Team 5.10(R) is a high-performance slipper which excels in the gym and competition settings. Utilizing a 2.5mm outsole of Stealth(R) HF(TM) rubber, a very soft compound, the Team 5.10(R) offers incredible sensitivity.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN DRAGON MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Dragon was designed with input from Fred Nicole and Dave Graham to be the ultimate bouldering shoe by taking advantage of its fine balance between stiffness and sensitivity. The Dragon's 3.5mm Stealth(R) HF(TM) outsole provides a stiff, supportive platform and extreme friction on all types of rock.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue Lace is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The iconic Anasazi is our most popular, all-around climbing shoe. Equipped with a versatile Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole, it climbs equally well both indoors and out as it is able to smear on soft, porous surfaces such as sandstone.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN TEAM VXI MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Team VXi expands the line as a more specialized version of the classic Team 5.10(R). The only climbing shoe with Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) rubber, our softest compound yet, the Team VXi excels for overhanging climbing and sticking to glassy, polished holds.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN VERDON VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: This highly asymmetric climbing shoe is designed for superior edging with out of the box comfort in mind. A molded thermoplastic midsole complimented by a molded piece of EVA fills in the dead space of the natural curves of the foot supporting your bone and muscle structure, and a double-strand Velcro closure assists with locking the foot into place. The Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsoles blend friction and durability for an incredible all-around performance on any surface.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN QUANTUM MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: For the redevelopment of the classic Quantum, we worked with the Huber brothers, Alex and Thomas, to develop an all-around performance shoe for any climbing setting. The Hubers tackle a diverse range of climbs with many different angles and rock textures, so Stealth(R) C4(TM) (our most versatile climbing compound) was a natural choice for the outsole.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN WALL MASTER MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Wall Master is an affordable shoe designed for beginners, intermediates and even experts who want to knock off multiple pitches in comfort. Its breathable, unlined leather upper molds to the foot for a comfortable fit, and the stiff sole adds support and structure for extra protection from cracks, giving the shoe excellent edging ability. The shoe features Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsoles are great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GYM MASTER MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Gym Master is designed specifically for gym rental fleets. Based off of the Wall Master, it has the same fit but with exterior size icons for easy fitting and a machine-washable canvas upper, which won't stretch out with use. The delamination-proof, one-piece molded Marathon(TM) outsole makes this one of the most durable shoes in the line.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GAMBIT LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Gambit is designed to bridge the gap between the comfort of the Rogue and the technical precision of the Anasazi line. The Gambit has low heel tension and a stiff midsole that make it comfortable for long climbs. The perforated Ariaprene tongue keeps your feet cool throughout the day. Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsoles make the Gambit an ideal all-mountain shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GAMBIT VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Gambit is designed to bridge the gap between the comfort of the Rogue and the technical precision of the Anasazi line. The Gambit has low heel tension and a stiff midsole that make it comfortable for long climbs. The perforated Ariaprene tongue keeps your feet cool throughout the day. Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsoles make the Gambit an ideal all-mountain shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HIANGLE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Said by many to be the most comfortable of our downturned climbing shoes, the Hiangle is an all-around performance shoe that is relaxed enough for all day climbing, yet aggressive enough to tackle steep, overhanging routes. Its Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole has a thicker application of rubber than many of our downturned shoes (4.2mm) which gives it the stiffest profile in the Aggressive line and a supportive feel on the foot. Stealth(R) C4(TM) performs well both indoors and outdoors by blending friction and durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The iconic Anasazi is our most popular, all-around climbing shoe. Equipped with a versatile Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole, it climbs equally well both indoors and out as it is able to smear on soft, porous surfaces such as sandstone.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI BLANCO MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Blanco is the most aggressive shoe in the Anasazi line. For 2016, we have updated the midsole to thermoplastic so the Blanco retains its famously stiff platform even longer. The eye stay also has been updated to a welded construction to make the shoe even sleeker. The heel rand has the most tension out of any Anasazi and the outsole is Stealth(R) C4(TM) making this one of the most powerful edging shoes in the world.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN MOCCASYM SYNTHETIC MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: In 1990 Five Ten(R) introduced a shoe for every climber's arsenal - the Anasazi MoccAsym. Low profile for thin cracks and equipped with the unique Asym(TM) heel slingshot, this slipper delivers exceptional precision and versatility. Its Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsole ensures maximum traction.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HIANGLE SYNTHETIC MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Said by many to be the most comfortable of our downturned climbing shoes, the Hiangle is an all-around performance shoe that is relaxed enough for all day climbing, yet aggressive enough to tackle steep, overhanging routes. Its Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole has a thicker application of rubber than many of our downturned shoes (4.2mm) which gives it the stiffest profile in the Aggressive line and a supportive feel on the foot. Stealth(R) C4(TM) performs well both indoors and outdoors by blending friction and durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HUECO MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: When the choice between comfort and performance tug you in two directions, the Hueco is the perfect balance. Top-quality split-grain leather and reinforced side stitching increase the shoe?s durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI PRO MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Anasazi Pro was started with the classic Anasazi and an Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) toe patch was added offering exceptional friction on volumes and holds. The closure system has been updated with a more breathable mesh tongue, and new Velcro straps which make the shoe more lightweight, breathable, and sleek. A little more heel tension than the classic Anasazi gives the Pro a bit more aggressive and precise fit.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN COYOTE VCS 2012 MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Coyote VCS is all about performance and comfort. This lined-canvas climbing shoe forms to the foot, with no deadspace and no hotspots. Designed for entry-level to advanced-intermediate, the Coyote VCS is an all-around performer.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN QUANTUM 2013 MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: For the redevelopment of the classic Quantum, we worked with the Huber brothers, Alex and Thomas, to develop an all-around performance shoe for any climbing setting. The Hubers tackle a diverse range of climbs with many different angles and rock textures, so Stealth(R) C4(TM) (our most versatile climbing compound) was a natural choice for the outsole.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI VCS XX MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Anasazi, our most popular all-around shoe comes in two VCS styles differentiated by the rubber compound used on each. Anasazi VCS in Golden Tan is equipped with a Stealth(R) Onyxx(TM) outsole, which is harder and more supportive.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN STONELANDS VCS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stonelands VCS has a padded tongue and moisture-wicking terrycloth lining for all-day comfort. Its supportive midsole conserve your foot strength, and the narrow heel cup and synthetic upper preserve your foot.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN STONELANDS LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stonelands Lace has a padded tongue and moisture-wicking terrycloth lining for all-day comfort. Its supportive midsole conserve your foot strength, and the narrow heel cup and synthetic upper preserve your foot.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN COYOTE LACE 2013 MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Coyote Lace is all about performance and comfort. This lined-canvas climbing shoe forms to the foot, with no deadspace and no hotspots. Designed for entry-level to advanced-intermediate, the Coyote Lace is an all-around performer.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN COYOTE VCS 2013 MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Coyote VCS is all about performance and comfort. This lined-canvas climbing shoe forms to the foot, with no deadspace and no hotspots. Designed for entry-level to advanced-intermediate, the Coyote VCS is an all-around performer.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN STONEMASTER RENTAL MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: This lined-canvas shoe features a padded tongue, extra thick rands to increase the life of the shoe, an asymmetrical, foot-friendly last and a graded midsole for custom fit and comfort. The Velcro(R) closure system makes it ideal for quick on/off.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI GUIDE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The stiffest and most supportive of our relaxed shoes, the Anasazi Guide brings the high-performing qualities of the Anasazi line and extreme comfort of the relaxed shoes for epic all-day adventures. Lacing which extends all the way to the toe box for better adjustability in the forefoot.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN VERDON LACE MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Built on an entirely new last, this highly asymmetric climbing shoe is designed for superior edging with out of the box comfort in mind. A molded thermoplastic midsole complimented by a molded piece of EVA fills in the dead space of the natural curves of the rock.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ARROWHEAD MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Arrowhead is a gently downturned shoe which excels in outdoor climbing environments. The synthetic cowdura upper is equipped with two Velcro straps, a padded tongue and a wider toe box for a relaxed and comfortable fit, while not foregoing the performance.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN STONELANDS MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stonelands has a padded tongue and moisture-wicking terrycloth lining for all-day comfort. Its supportive midsoles conserves foot strength.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN BLACKWING MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Blackwings are highly downturned shoes that are designed for performance without sacrificing the elements of comfort. The wider toe box, padded tongue, synthetic upper and medium-stiff midsole help to keep your shoes fitting properly (no stretch).

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE VCS SYNTHETIC MEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. The Ortholite foam sock liner provides moisture control by absorbing sweat.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR MID MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four Mid comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. A mid-top ankle cuff gives you additional protection from the uncertainties of the trail.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR GTX MID LEATHER MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four GTX Mid contains a GORE-TEX(R) liner for waterproof, windproof, breathable dependability in even the wettest conditions. The new Camp Four GTX Mid comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR GTX MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four GTX contains a GORE-TEX(R) membrane for waterproof and breathable dependability in even the wettest conditions. The new Camp Four GTX comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN EDDY MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Eddy features a non-marking Phantom(TM) rubber outsole, based off the original blend of friction and durability of our classic Stealth(R) S1(TM) used on the Canyoneer. The front of the outsole features a Climbing Zone(TM) for technical approaches.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN EDDY PRO MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Eddy features a non-marking Phantom(TM) rubber outsole, based off the original blend of friction and durability of our classic Stealth(R) S1(TM) used on the Canyoneer. The front of the outsole features a Climbing Zone(TM) for technical approaches.

Product.Product_Name: CAPROCK MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: Ideal for hikes and everyday activities, these men's shoes have a breathable mesh upper and a TRAXION(TM) outsole for optimal grip in all directions. The low-cut hikers feature a comfortable wider last and an ADIPRENE(R) insert for shock absorption. They include two insoles of different thicknesses so you can personalise the fit.

Product.Product_Name: CAPROCK GTX MEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: Built to handle early morning stream crossings and sudden downpours, these men's hiking shoes have a durable mesh upper and a waterproof GORE-TEX(R) lining to keep air flowing and feet dry. Two insoles of different thicknesses are included, so you can personalise the fit.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KESTREL PRO BOA MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Transfer maximum power to the pedals. The Kestral Pro Boa(R) combines our stiffest sole and clipless compatibility for an efficient all-mountain ride. The Boa(R) Fit system means you can dial in a secure fit, while the wide Stealth(R) C4 rubber sole provides confident footing in all terrain. Mesh inserts enhance breathability, and the quick-drying synthetic upper maintains all-weather comfort.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER PRO MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: All-day comfort on and off the mountain. These flat pedal biking shoes provide grip and durability for all-mountain and enduro riding. An impact-resistant toe box complements the medium-stiff build for a responsive ride. The signature sticky rubber and purpose-built tread pattern keep your feet firmly planted on your pedals. The shoes have a casual look for times off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KESTREL LACE MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Transfer maximum power to the pedals. These all-weather mountain biking shoes have a clipless style that's compatible with all clipless mountain bike pedals. A carbon-infused nylon shank adds to the stiff build. The Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsole provides exceptional grip on and off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CONTACT MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Ride anywhere with these exceptionally responsive flat pedal mountain bike shoes. The treadless design and a Contact Outsole(TM) eliminates lug interference and allows for split-second adjustments. The shoes feature a Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) rubber outsole that provides outstanding grip.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER DLX MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Comfort and control on the trail or on the street. These mountain biking shoes offer all-day wearability and flat pedal control. The soft rubber outsole and proven tread pattern maintain confident pedal grip. A coated leather build adds weather resistance for All conditions, anytime wear.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SLEUTH DLX MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Get dual performance with these transitional mountain bike shoes. Designed to grip the pedals, they have a weather-resistant suede upper for soft comfort. The skate shoe design is padded for comfort yet lightweight for all-day rides and walks around town.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Gravity, enduro or around town. These flat pedal mountain biking shoes are inspired by the style and simplicity of BMX shoes. The signature sticky rubber outsole keeps your feet firmly planted on your pedals around town and on the trail. A medium flex and durable upper maintain a responsive feel. The shoes have a casual look for downtime comfort and style.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT PRO MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Take on aggressive rides with these downhill and enduro mountain bike shoes. They feature a fast-drying synthetic upper for wet rides and a clipless style that's versatile and compatible with all clipless mountain bike pedals. The secure lace and hook-and-loop closure supports your foot, and the Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsole provides exceptional grip.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Be ready for casual trails and aggressive single track. These biking shoes feature a clipless style that's compatible with all mountain bike clipless pedals. A secure lace and hook-and-loop closure allows for a snug fit. The skate shoe design maximizes cushioning and comfort.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN IMPACT PRO MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Hit the trails in comfort. These mountain biking shoes are built with weather-resistant, quick-drying materials. An impact-resistant toe box adds protection. The Stealth(R) S1 outsole grips the pedals and the pavement, and the stiff midsole delivers power to the pedals.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN IMPACT HIGH MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Rock garden or road gap. These flat pedal mountain biking shoes are built for aggressive enduro and gravity riding. A full leather upper and high-cut design complement the wide durable platform for confident pedal control. The stiff midsole and snug heel cup transfer power to your pedals, and the signature sticky rubber outsole keeps your feet firmly planted all through the ride.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN IMPACT LOW MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Keep it rubber side down. These mountain biking shoes set the standard for flat pedal performance. They feature a wide, durable platform for enduro and gravity riding. A full leather upper and reinforced toe cap maintain durability and impact resistance. The signature sticky rubber outsole grips the pedals in all conditions.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN IMPACT SAM HILL MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Steep, technical and fast. Sam Hill sets the standard for enduro riding. Like their namesake, these flat pedal mountain biking shoes are designed for speed. The reinforced build offers a stiff midsole and grip for aggressive high-speed enduro riding. A fast-drying upper resists moisture, and a signature sticky rubber outsole keeps your feet right where you want them.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SPITFIRE MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Bike to work. Walk to class. These do-it-all shoes are designed for everyday comfort. A non-marking sticky rubber outsole to grips flat pedals and campus sidewalks. The mid-cut upper offers extra coverage and abrasion resistance around the ankle.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SLEUTH MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Bring bike style everywhere you go, every day. Equal parts high-performance biking shoe and everyday sneaker, these shoes offer multi-sport utility for dedicated riders. The non-marking rubber outsole complements a pedal-gripping tread that keeps your feet firmly planted on dirt-jump pedals. Non-Marking rubber - Stealth(R) Marathon(TM) rubber outsole for unbeatable grip on flat pedals. Maximum grip - Micro-dotty(TM) tread for optimal pedal feel.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN DISTRICT CLIPS MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Bike to work. Ride to class. These clipless commuter biking shoes feature a clean look for smooth transitions between bike and work or school. They feature a non-marking rubber outsole for surefooted travel off the bike. A weather-resistant upper helps keep your feet dry. Laces tuck away for interference-free pedaling.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN DISTRICT FLATS MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Bike to work. Ride to class. These flat pedal commuter biking shoes feature a clean look for smooth transitions between bike and work or school. The non-marking rubber outsole offers surefooted grip on and off the bike. A weather-resistant upper keeps your feet dry.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER EPS MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider EPS with Primaloft was designed for winter use, protecting you from the elements and delivering the classic performance of the Freerider's Stealth(R) S1(TM) rubber outsole in even the coldest of conditions. Heavily insulated.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER EPS MID MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Extend your riding season into the cold weather. The Freerider EPS Mid adds insulation and weather resistance to the classic Freerider design. The shoes' mid-height leather upper features water resistance and reduced seams to keep your feet dry. PrimaLoft(R) insulation in the toe box and tongue keeps feet warm. The Stealth(R) S1 outsole and Dotty rubber tread provide unbeatable grip on wet pedals and slippery ground.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider is our most versatile All-Mountain flat pedal shoe. Inspired by the comfort and style of BMX, we equipped the Freerider shoes with Stealth(R) S1(TM) rubber for added support and thickness; making the Freerider your anywhere, anytime, anything shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER ELEMENTS MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider Elements is much more water resistant than its standard counterpart, combining a DWR-treated leather upper with synthetic panels to keep your feet warm and dry in the harshest conditions. The Stealth(R) S1(TM) rubber outsoles absorb shock and reduce vibration and the classic Dotty(TM) tread gives you great traction on and off the bike even when wet.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KESTREL LACE MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Built off of the success of the original Kestrel, the Kestrel Lace is designed to transfer power to the pedals as efficiently as possible with a classic lace closure. The Kestrel Lace features a Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole and wider cleat interface that is compatible with every type of SPD Pedal.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CANVAS MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Equipped with our non-marking Stealth(R) Phantom(TM) rubber on the high-friction Dotty(TM) outsole, the Freerider Canvas is a shoe which can handle all the rigors of the bike park and the backcountry. The durable canvas upper makes this shoe more breathable and lighter than the original Freerider.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CONTACT MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider Contact features Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) rubber, our softest rubber compound. Our innovative and treadless Contact Outsole(TM) under the ball of the foot allowing for quick, on-the-fly adjustments without lug interference.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SPITFIRE MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed for maximum comfort and durability, the Spitfire is an all-around shoe that provides excellent grip in everyday life. The Spitfire features a one-piece molded cupsole for comfort and support. Our non-marking Marathon(TM) rubber and our unique Micro-Dotty(TM) tread will keep your footing sure on the bike, skateboard or sidewalk.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SLEUTH MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The quintessential multi-sport shoe, the Sleuth has the lowest profile of our product line. The non-marking Marathon(TM) rubber outsole offers a tuned grip for freedom of movement, and its suede upper brings increased durability whether you are riding local trails or flying off jumps. The Micro-Dotty(TM) tread is coupled with an internal EVA midsole to provide a stiff and supportive platform for whatever action you find yourself facing.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER HIGH MEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider High is perfect for the dirt jumper or downhiller looking for ankle protection and style. Product.Product_Name: 510 FULL ZIP HOODIE WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: Savor rest days in this cozy hoodie. Made of soft, sweat-wicking French terry and cut with a wide fit, this full-zip sweatshirt features a Five Ten graphic on the front. It has kangaroo pockets to keep your hands warm, stretchy ribbed cuffs and a drawcord-adjustable hood.

Product.Product_Name: 510 TEE WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: Put a little adventure in every day. This t-shirt shares the Five Ten spirit for exploration with a bold Five Ten graphic across the chest. The organic cotton build sheds sweat to keep you dry and is soft to the touch.

Product.Product_Name: RESPONSE HOODIE WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: You get out there before the day has a chance to warm up, and this women's running hoodie provides the full coverage and breathability you need to run through the sunrise.

Product.Product_Name: ULTIMATE V NECK TEE WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: An essential for training, this women's t-shirt is made of moisture-wicking jersey fabric to help you stay dry when you're pushing the pace of your workout. The V-neck tee is soft and lightweight for a comfortable feel against your skin.

Product.Product_Name: ULTIMATE LONG SLEEVE WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: Add comfort to cool-weather workouts in this women's training t-shirt. Built in sweat-wicking fabric with fast-drying performance, the long sleeve crewneck tee features a soft, smooth rib-knit design. The lightweight and easy-to-move-in tee helps you stay focused on your regimen.

Product.Product_Name: RESPONSE SHORT TIGHT WOMEN'S
Product.Long_Description: Keep cool on your runs in these women's short tights. Built in soft, stretchy fabric that moves fluidly with your stride, they have climacool(R) and mesh side panels for optimal breathability. Finished with a sweat-guard zip pocket and reflective details.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GUIDE TENNIE W WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Cling to rocks and slick climbing surfaces. These shoes feature a C4 Stealth(R) rubber that provides unbeatable traction when edging and powering off slender ledges. An outer climbing zone offers additional friction. The stiff midsole gives you stability and control on mixed terrain.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ACCESS KNIT WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Take on technical boulders and terrain. These climbing shoes are built with exceptional grip. The outer climbing zone delivers friction against technical surfaces. A soft midsole and knit textile upper provide maximum comfort for long days on the mountain.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FIVE TENNIE W WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The best routes are off the beaten path. These approach shoes are designed for the scrambles and hikes that lead the way. A sticky rubber outsole and extended rubber around the toe handle abrasion and provide friction on uneven scree. A sock-like fit and lace closure offer stability on mixed terrain. High-friction rubber - Stealth(R) S1 rubber outsole for unbeatable grip. Unmatched grip - Climbing zone on outsole for friction on technical terrain.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GUIDE TENNIE WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Guide Tennie's hand-ground beveled climbing toe delivers precision-edging power and the Dotty(TM) tread coupled with Stealth(R) C4(TM) guarantees unrivaled traction on rock. An ergonomic last design, mesh lining and compression-molded midsole make the Guide Tennie comfortable when hiking long miles or engaging in technical scrambling and climbing. The durable suede leather upper provides water-resistance while remaining breathable on warm days.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ACCESS MESH WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stealth(R) S1(TM) outsole on the Access Mesh features a climbing zone for added durability, technical edging and smearing performance. The lightweight EVA midsole has a high rubber content which increases shock absorption and adds durability. The reinforced toe cap coupled with rubberized exoskeleton lacing system make this a highly protective and supportive approach shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ACCESS KNIT WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stealth(R) PH(TM) outsole on the Access Knit features a climbing zone for added durability, technical edging and smearing performance. The lightweight EVA midsole has a high rubber content which increases shock absorption and adds durability. The knit upper provides a snug, sock-like fit and added breathability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ACCESS LEATHER WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stealth(R) S1(TM) outsole on the Access Leather features a climbing zone for added durability, technical edging and smearing performance. The lightweight EVA midsole has a high rubber content which increases shock absorption and adds durability. The reinforced toe cap coupled with rubberized exoskeleton lacing system make this a highly protective and supportive approach shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GUIDE TENNIE 2016 - DISCONTINUED WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Guide Tennie's hand-ground beveled climbing toe delivers precision-edging power and the Dotty(TM) tread coupled with Stealth(R) C4(TM) guarantees unrivaled traction on rock. An ergonomic last design, mesh lining and compression-molded midsole make the Guide Tennie comfortable when hiking long miles or engaging in technical scrambling and climbing. The durable suede leather upper provides water-resistance while remaining breathable on warm days.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ACCESS WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Stealth(R) S1(TM) outsole on the Access features a climbing zone for added durability, technical edging and smearing performance. The lightweight EVA midsole has a high rubber content which increases shock absorption and adds strength.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GUIDE TENNIE 2016 WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Guide Tennie's hand-ground beveled climbing toe delivers precision-edging power and the Dotty(TM) tread coupled with Stealth(R) C4(TM) guarantees unrivaled traction on rock. An ergonomic last design, mesh lining and compression-molded midsole make the Guide Tennie the ultimate approach shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN URBAN APPROACH WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: We designed the Urban Approach to be a light and casual approach shoe with an emphasis on comfort for tackling urban terrain. We equipped the Urban Approach with Phantom(TM) rubber, our non-marking rubber compound for performance without a trace.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN APPROACH PRO WOMEN'S APPROACH SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Approach Pro is our stiffer and more technical approach shoe. The Approach Pro has a Stealth C4(TM) rubber outsole, our most popular rubber used on our climbing shoes. The extended lacing and stable exoskeleton ensure a precision fit for climbing.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HIANGLE WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Tackle the most technical climbs in comfort. These high-performance climbing shoes have a leather upper that conforms to your foot for a snug fit. The aggressive downturned toe and a Stealth(R) C4 rubber outsole grip narrow overhangs. Extended toe rands offer maximum friction.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI LV PRO W WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Fit and feel are everything. Built off the design of the Anasazi, these climbing shoes offer a low-volume fit with a blend of sensitivity and power for all-around climbing. This pro edition features a rubber toe patch for increased friction and tension at the heel for a precise fit. A perforated tongue provides breathability, and the hook-and-loop closure offers easy entry.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GAMBIT VCS WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Move outdoors. These climbing shoes offer a blend of sensitivity and support so you can take your climb from the gym to the rock. They're built with a lined leather upper with a breathable tongue for comfort. A Stealth(R) C4 rubber outsole provides unbeatable grip and unparalleled edging power.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ASYM W WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Friction or edge hold, fit and feel are everything. These climbing shoes have an asymmetrical hook-and-loop closure and an unlined leather upper that help dial in a comfortable, secure fit. A moderate downturn and medium-stiff midsole maintain edging power and support for sport routes and mixed climbing.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI LV W WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Do-it-all versatility. Built around the design of the best-selling Anasazi, these climbing shoes feature a low-volume build for narrow feet and a hook-and-loop closure for easy on and off. They offer a blend of sensitivity and support for all-purpose climbing, indoors and out.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI LV WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Bringing the same comfort, support and performance, the Anasazi LV is a lower-volume version of our popular Anasazi VCS. The finely tuned heel cup and asymmetric toe shape combined with a narrower fit make these among the world's top-performing edging shoes. Their durable Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsoles are great for climbing on any terrain.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE VCS WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HIANGLE WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Said by many to be the most comfortable of our downturned climbing shoes, the Hiangle is an all-around performance shoe that is relaxed enough for all day climbing, yet aggressive enough to tackle steep, overhanging routes. Its Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole has a thicker application of rubber than many of our downturned shoes (4.2mm) which gives it the stiffest profile in the Aggressive line and a supportive feel on the foot. Stealth(R) C4(TM) performs well both indoors and outdoors by blending friction and durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN GAMBIT VCS WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Gambit is designed to bridge the gap between the comfort of the Rogue and the technical precision of the Anasazi line. The Gambit has low heel tension and a stiff midsole that make it comfortable for long climbs. The perforated Ariaprene tongue keeps your feet cool throughout the day. Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsoles make the Gambit an ideal all-mountain shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HIANGLE SYNTHETIC WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Said by many to be the most comfortable of our downturned climbing shoes, the Hiangle is an all-around performance shoe that is relaxed enough for all day climbing, yet aggressive enough to tackle steep, overhanging routes. Its Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole has a thicker application of rubber than many of our downturned shoes (4.2mm) which gives it the stiffest profile in the Aggressive line and a supportive feel on the foot. Stealth(R) C4(TM) performs well both indoors and outdoors by blending friction and durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN BLACKWING 2012 WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Blackwings are highly downturned shoes that are designed for performance without sacrificing the elements of comfort. The wider toe box, padded tongue, synthetic upper and medium-stiff midsole help to keep your shoes fitting properly (no stretch).

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SIREN WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Our women's trad climbing shoe, the Siren delivers all-around performance from technical face climbing to cracks to the gym. A relaxed heel and lined perforated synthetic upper material and keeps your feet cooler resulting in less swelling throughout the day.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN COYOTE VCS 2013 WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Coyote VCS is all about performance and comfort. This lined-canvas climbing shoe forms to the foot, with no deadspace and no hotspots. Designed for entry-level to advanced-intermediate, the Coyote VCS is an all-around performer.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ANASAZI PRO WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Anasazi Pro was started with the classic Anasazi and an Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) toe patch was added offering exceptional friction on volumes and holds. The closure system has been updated with a more breathable mesh tongue, and new Velcro straps which make the shoe more lightweight, breathable, and sleek. A little more heel tension than the classic Anasazi gives the Pro a bit more aggressive and precise fit.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN BLACKWING WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Blackwing has the same performance and comfort of the original Blackwing, but with a more narrow profile and a more low-volume fit to accommodate our female climbers. The medium-stiff midsole and padded tongue keep your shoes comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE LACE WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue Lace is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym. Lace-up closure.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN ROGUE VCS SYNTHETIC WOMEN'S CLIMBING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR 2012 WOMEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. The Ortholite foam sock liner provides moisture control by absorbing sweat.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR 2013 WOMEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. The Ortholite foam sock liner provides moisture control by absorbing sweat.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR WOMEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. The Ortholite foam sock liner provides moisture control by absorbing sweat.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN CAMP FOUR MID WOMEN'S HIKING BOOT
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Four Mid comes equipped with increased lug heights for better penetration into soft ground, and reduced seams on the upper for improved durability and weather resistance. A mid-top ankle cuff gives you additional protection from the uncertainties of the trail.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KESTREL LACE W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Transfer maximum power to the pedals on the trail. These all-weather mountain biking shoes have a clipless style that's compatible with all clipless mountain bike pedals. A carbon-infused nylon shank adds to the stiff build. The Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsole provides exceptional grip on and off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER PRO W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Transition from the bike to the ground and back again in comfort. These flexible shoes feature a grippy Stealth(R) Phantom rubber outsole. The quick-drying synthetic upper keeps you ready for the elements, and a cushioned sockliner delivers all-day comfort.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CONTACT WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Ride anywhere with these exceptionally responsive flat pedal mountain bike shoes. The treadless design and a Contact Outsole(TM) eliminates lug interference and allows for split-second adjustments. The shoes feature a Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) rubber outsole that provides outstanding grip.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN SLEUTH DLX W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Tuned grip, on and off the bike. Equal parts high-performance biking shoes and everyday sneaker, these mountain biking shoes are built with a soft suede leather upper for comfort and increased durability. The Dotty(TM) tread is coupled with an internal EVA midsole to provide a stiff and supportive platform for whatever action you find yourself facing. Optimal friction - Stealth(R) Phantom rubber outsole. Casual comfort - Suede upper provides comfort and durability.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: These versatile All-Mountain biking shoes feature a cushioned BMX and skate style for maximum comfort. The high-grip Stealth(R) rubber outsole with Classic Dotty(TM) tread provides excellent traction on flat pedals.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT PRO W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Take on aggressive rides with these downhill and enduro mountain bike shoes. They feature a fast-drying synthetic upper for wet rides and a clipless style that's versatile and compatible with all clipless mountain bike pedals. The secure lace and hook-and-loop closure supports your foot, and the Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber outsole provides exceptional grip.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Be ready for downhill trails and aggressive single track. These biking shoes feature a clipless style that's compatible with all clipless mountain bike pedals. A secure lace and hook-and-loop closure allows for a snug fit. The skate shoe design maximizes cushioning and comfort without adding weight.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN IMPACT PRO W WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Hit the trails in comfort. These mountain biking shoes are built with weather-resistant, quick-drying materials. An impact-resistant toe box adds protection. The Stealth(R) S1 outsole grips the pedals and the pavement, and the stiff midsole delivers power to the pedals.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CANVAS WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Equipped with our non-marking Stealth(R) Phantom(TM) rubber on the high-friction Dotty(TM) outsole, the Freerider Canvas is a shoe which can handle all the rigors of the bike park and the backcountry. The durable canvas upper makes this shoe more breathable and lighter than the original Freerider.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider is our most versatile All-Mountain flat pedal shoe. Inspired by the comfort and style of BMX, the Freerider will be your anywhere, anytime, anything shoe.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER CONTACT WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Freerider Contact features Stealth(R) Mi6(TM) rubber, our softest rubber compound. Our innovative and treadless Contact Outsole(TM) under the ball of the foot allowing for quick, on-the-fly adjustments without lug interference.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KESTREL LACE WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Built off of the success of the original Kestrel, the Kestrel Lace is designed to transfer power to the pedals as efficiently as possible with a classic lace closure. The Kestrel Lace features a Stealth(R) C4(TM) outsole and wider cleat interface that is compatible with every type of SPD Pedal.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN FREERIDER PRO WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: A completely updated version of our legendary Freerider, the Freerider Pro touts superior toe protection and is quicker drying than its predecessor and utilizes a fully dotty Stealth(R) S1(TM)outsole for proven grip and durability . The concept behind the Freerider Pro is to expand on everything the original shoe did well such as durability, protection, and grip; while minimizing bulk and drying time.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT PRO WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Hellcat Pro comes equipped with a DWR synthetic upper to keep your feet warm and dry in the harshest conditions by beading up and repelling water. The 3/4 dual density vibration dampening TPU shank allows for flex when walking while maintaining rigidity when pedaling. The Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber absorbs shock and reduces vibration and the classic Dotty(TM) tread gives you great traction off the bike, even in wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN HELLCAT WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: This Hellcat is a lighter and lower-profile version of our classic Hellcat. Its upper is a combination of leather and synthetic for durability and breathability. The Stealth(R) C4(TM) rubber absorbs shock and reduces vibration and the classic Dotty(TM) tread gives you great traction off the bike, even in wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN MALTESE FALCON WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: The Maltese Falcon was designed for comfort and speed. This shoe has a Stealth(R) S1(TM) outsole for all-around high-performance on any terrain with a perfect blend of durability and stickiness.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN KARVER 2013 WOMEN'S MOUNTAIN BIKE SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Built for bumps, jumps and logs, the Karver does it all. Designed specifically for flat pedal mountain biking the Five Ten Karver frees you from toe clips. The mid-height ankle includes padding for comfort and control, and its supportive action leather uppers protect any riders feet. The Stealth S1 outsoles create the stickiest interface between pedals and feet.

Product.Product_Name: QUESA WOMEN'S TRAIL RUNNING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Carve new paths on the trail in these running shoes featuring a Women's specific fit. They offer a breathable mesh upper with suede overlays, while foot-hugging construction provides extra comfort. The outsole is designed expressly for the trail. Shoe type - Neutral shoes for the versatile runner. Cushioned comfort - Combined Cloudfoam midsole and outsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning.

Product.Product_Name: GALAXY WOMEN'S TRAIL RUNNING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Take to the trails with plush comfort and maximum breathability. These women's running shoes have an air mesh and synthetic upper for continued airflow through any distance. A Cloudfoam midsole provides pillowy cushioning over any terrain, and a super-grippy outsole grabs uneven surfaces with ease.

Product.Product_Name: RESPONSE WOMEN'S TRAIL RUNNING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Tackle any terrain in these women's trail running shoes. Designed for a steady grip and responsive feel over a variety of surfaces, they feature a lightweight mesh upper riding on a rugged outsole with talon-like tread that performs in wet or dry conditions.

Product.Product_Name: SUPERNOVA WOMEN'S TRAIL RUNNING SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Rocky, uneven terrain is no match for these women's trail running shoes. Power up hills and mountains with a Boost midsole that energizes and stabilizes every step. A durable mesh upper features a seam-free waterline for protection in wet conditions. The grippy outsole adds superior traction.

Product.Product_Name: ADISSAGE WOMEN'S WATER SHOE
Product.Long_Description: Like a spa for your feet, these women's slides have massage nubs on the footbed that soothe and relax tired muscles. The adjustable bandage upper dries quickly and features 3-Stripes and an adidas Badge of Sport. An EVA outsole offers lightweight comfort.
